InBoundPortManagement - Class in cps.mouradalpha.ports
The class InBoundPortManagement defines the inbound port exposing the interface ManagementCI for components of type Broker.

create the port under some given URI and for a given owner, we need also to specify the index for the read executor service and for the write executor.
